title: STAT+: Paul Hudson out as Sanofi CEO
description: Sanofi is replacing Paul Hudson as CEO, amid questions about which medicines will drive the company's growth in the future.
content: Sanofi is replacing Paul Hudson as CEO, amid questions about which medicines will drive the company's growth in the future.
